pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric Estimation for Interval-Grouped Data // Kernel density and distribution estimation for interval-grouped data (Reyes, Francisco-Fernandez and Cao 2016, 2017) doi:10.1080/10485252.2016.1163348, doi:10.1007/s11749-017-0523-9, (Gonzalez-Andujar, Francisco- Fernandez, Cao, Reyes, Urbano, Forcella and Bastida 2016) doi:10.1111/wre.12216 and nonparametric estimation of seedling emergence indices (Cao, Francisco-Fernandez, Anand, Bastida and Gonzalez-Andujar 2011) doi:10.1017/S002185961100030X.
